title: About
body:
Substrate explores the hidden connections between the systems that power modern civilization: AI, energy, financial markets, and food security. These aren't separate stories; they're interdependent layers of infrastructure where decisions in one domain ripple through the others in ways that most analysis misses. 

Here, you'll find deep dives into the data that challenges prevailing narratives. The goal isn't prediction, it's pattern recognition. Understanding the substrate beneath the headlines is the first step toward seeing what comes next.\
\
SM
